name: @jsquash/avif
description: Wasm AVIF encoder and decoder supporting the browser. Repackaged from Squoosh App.

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp -r codec package.json README.md *.d.ts .npmignore ../../LICENSE dist && cd dist/codec && npm run patch-pre-script
scripts.prepublishOnly: [[ "$PWD" == *'/dist' ]] && exit 0 || (echo 'Please run npm publish from the dist directory' && exit 1)
